title: Will Riot be at Pax Aus 2015?

embed.description: Badges are officially available for PAX Aus 2015! Grab them from our registration page while you can, they won't last forever! If this will be your first PAX Experience, also be sure to look through the...

body: The title says it all, I am just wondering if Riot have confirmed that they will be at Pax 2015 this year. Is it to early to know? If so what is the chance they will be going. Thanks to all who help.

replies.body:
KJS basically nailed it :)

We won't be at PAX this year as we're focusing on the OPL Final at Luna Park.

If you can't make it to Sydney there's going to be viewing parties at HOYTS you can check out:

http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oplfinals-2015/#viewing

Also, if you bought a ticket for PAX before the 4th of May you can get the skin by emailing pax2015@riotgames.com with your summoner name and photo of the ticket, etc.
I sent my email in but didn't receive a skin. Did my ticket not get verified properly and would it be worth resending?
So we have to actually wait to get the physical ticket? Or can we just email you the receipt?

Nope. 
All their stuff will be there though. 
You can request the free skin code by sending a support ticket if you have the ticket for PAX AUS 2015 already.

> [{quoted}](name=kJs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2dzAlFg9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-02T23:56:54.589+0000)
>
> Nope. 
> All their stuff will be there though. 
> You can request the free skin code by sending a support ticket if you have the ticket for PAX AUS 2015 already.

yeah but you had to buy the ticket before they announced they weren't going didn't you?

So if I've repurchased 4 tickets (for myself and 3 friends), when do we email you guys as such? Do we email you a photo of ourselves holding the physical ticket? Or can I just email you guys the digital receipt?
Wait so riot wont be there but the stuff will be there? And if I brought a ticket after the 4th i cant get any skin? P.S what was the skin?
Ok thanks for your help guys.
